Posts.Content: MOchsner wrote: I had my first mammogram a week ago and now I have been told there is architectural distortion in the right breast.  I have never had any trauma or surgery to my breasts.  Everything I find online says this is a sign of cancer.  Please help me understand.  I am scared out of my mind.  I am scheduled for a diagnostic mammogram and ultrasound on Tuesday.  Waiting is making me crazy! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Scared - Please Help MOchsner Ksk04
